attributes.action: ban psychics, mediums and others who claim to be able to contact the dead or entities from practising in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The claims of so called "mediums" or "psychics" to be able to contact the dead is a practice which seeks to exploit those who are grieving or are in otherwise in need of answers or re-assurance. 

There is no proven scientific evidence whatsoever that these people can contact the dead, angels or spirits and as such they should be prevented from practicing what is in essence a fraud and from taking money or otherwise exploiting those who are vulnerable
